subject: Urgent - Contract dispute advice needed
legal_basis: Evidence Act 1995 (Cth) ss 118-119; Esso Australia Resources Ltd v Commissioner of Taxation (1999)
reasoning: The communication involved a lawyer in-house (Sarah Chen) seeking specific legal advice on contractual and liability issues, with clear indications that the primary purpose is legal advice. The email and attachments were made in confidence and with the expectation of confidentiality. No waiver or third-party disclosures are evident, aligning with privilege criteria under the Evidence Act and case law.
